attributes.action: Nigel Farage should be made a Lord in the House of Lords
attributes.background: Nigel Farage has spent most of his life fighting for democracy and is now a world wide recognised figure on the world stage. Nigel has been a life long campaigner for Brexit and has held the government to account on many issues and he should be rewarded by the people of the UK and made a Lord

rejection.details:
In any case, non-party-political life peers are nominated by the House of Lords Appointments Commission, which is independent.

You can find out how members of the public can nominate people as life peers here:

http://lordsappointments.independent.gov.uk/frequently_asked_questions.aspx
